Metadata: A selective survey of the endocrine system of the rainbow trout ("Oncorhynchus mykiss") with emphasis on the hormonal regulation of ion balance

Teleost endocrinology is a flourishing field of research. This paper provides a brief survey of fish endocrinology applicable to rainbow trout biology, and physiological responses to environmental and developmental demands, particularly factors associated with osmoregulation and calcium regulation. A brief introduction to the 'newer' hormones, which have as yet received only limited study in teleosts, is also presented.
